tweets.text: No open windows, summer breezes, bird song, and gentle night time scents for us. Only Hydrogen Sulphide, unimaginable stench, stuffy rooms, and air freshener @pow_rebecca @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @DrMariaNeira @JuliaBradbury @stopthestink #stopthestink https://t.co/NAZv5BrOtt
@EnvAgencyMids You‚Äôve allowed this malpractice. Who pays? My grandkids in headaches and nosebleeds that shouldn‚Äôt occur. @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

tweets.text:
Environment Minister @pow_rebecca took part in a local litter-pick in Taunton today for the Great British Spring Cleanüå≥

The campaign encourages people to clear litter from our streets, parks and beaches.
 
Read more: https://t.co/7tvNF5N3aS

@KeepBritainTidy #GBSpringClean https://t.co/rxEhRapT5k

#StopTheStink: @PHE_uk and @EnvAgencyMids, since this is now a medium-term issue (90-days), why is the more stringent WHO tolerability of 20 Œºg m¬Ø¬≥ hydrogen sulphide not applied when considering respiratory effects? (Ref: Page 5 of https://t.co/0IJ1VGs9pk) https://t.co/tkqsRQ1FxM

@HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Using WHO guidelines for H2S is a smokescreen. It's impossible to measure with accuracy the effects of molecules of H2S on every adult and child for every minute of the day and night. The agencies need to act on the high volume of complaints and symptoms. That's the evidence.

I've seen the stink from Walley's reported from inside Newcastle-under-Lyme @vuecinemas this evening as well as in other town centre locations.

This is exactly what was feared - why on earth weren't the additional requirements of the operator identified earlier? @EnvAgency

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

tweets.text:
If we were in the USA, their EPA would have advised staying indoors and protecting the elderly and children when the H2S from #WalleysQuarry hit its peak over just ten minutes. I wonder how they'd respond to repeated exposure over months @EnvAgency 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/NDvQCA2BSO

Thank you @SarahInNUL for compiling this. @EnvAgencyMids, please can you explain what technical, legal or financial challenges are unique to Walleys Quarry Landfill that prevent you from taking the same enforcement action? We're an understanding bunch, we just want to know why. https://t.co/yBdiMmY6Ag
‚ÄòIt‚Äôs terrifying‚Äô: the English village overwhelmed by landfill stink https://t.co/F9K2jCUwGQ

There has been no rain today! Why is this revolting pathogenic #sewage (inc particulate, #plastic, pharmaceutical & chemical contaminants) being discharged into the #LondonLea #RiverLea  @thameswater @DefraWater  @EnvAgency @LDN_environment @LondonAssembly https://t.co/THoGla8JTf

tweets.text:
Re direct to no 10. 
@AlokSharma_RDG an you get some proper managers into @EnvAgency https://t.co/bl9fRoKNGY

@CleanIlkley @YorkshireWater @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK When water companies say it‚Äôs ‚Äúcomplex‚Äù, it just means spending money on infrastructure will reduce the money we pay out to ourselves or shareholders.

Horses are wonderful animals. Majestic and trustworthy animals. 

Contrast this with Walleys Quarry Landfill run by @RedIndustries2 who simply don‚Äôt care.  

They poison a town and don‚Äôt care if it‚Äôs people or horses.  

Come on @EnvAgencyMids get the whip and sort it. https://t.co/JqHHm7JFqa

@EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @DrMariaNeira @antheaturner @JuliaBradbury @mwilliamsthomas 

The annoyance level for hydrogen sulphide (h2s) is 7 ugm3. 

Would anyone at the EA like to comment on why we are seeing figures as high as 1017 ugm3. 

#StopTheStink https://t.co/G4jobNaxsi

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency By definition, if it is not behaving how you expect, then you have no understanding how to control it, thus the landfill is out of control. When Toddbrook Dam Spillway was out of control, ¬£12M of funding was ‚Äúfound‚Äù to bring it back under control (https://t.co/OKNziVWCTo)

WOW 1350 ug/m3 measured at the Galingale air quality monitor! The WHO human health limit is set to 150 ug/m3! You REALLY are killing us slowly. You did a great job at hiding that PEAK in your official reports! @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @PHE_uk #stopthestink https://t.co/pKpw3uIzxo

tweets.text: Yet again I have lost my voice due to breathing in toxic landfill gas from 2am. This is no way to live it‚Äôs unacceptable people were gassed in wars and here we are in our homes trying to live our lives #StopTheStink @MattHancock @BorisJohnson @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @pow_rebecca

tweets.text: How‚Äôs your weekend going @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca @EnvAgencyMids I‚Äôve booked into my fallout shelter for the bank holiday as the unregulated @RedIndustries2 toxic gas engulfs @NewsNBC @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg Do @PHE_uk still exist? #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/f1sNo1C7RR

Iv been so poorly. Antibiotics & steroids for me! GP says i have pleurisy & he suspects its the result of being gassed out by landfill gas H2S in my own home, especially last Thursday! @ClareDinnisEA where is the @EnvAgency urgency in resolving this #StopTheStink  @AaronBell4NUL

They can‚Äôt even confirm it will be fixed in a year.   
#StopTheStink https://t.co/KuBMTOOtLG

Help need on identity of lower right please #WildflowerID.

üêï Keep dogs on a lead

#RespectProtectEnjoy @candmclub https://t.co/dlE04QYZzf

@ClareDinnisEA on a sight visit by @EnvAgency 2 #WalleysQuarry 6 lorries were rejected by the EA You say it contained nothing hazardous, was only plasterboard. Plasterboard on its own is not hazardous but mixed with general waste it creates H2S of wich is hazardous #StopTheStink https://t.co/pu2MoQVgXX

Great start of the #KeepBritainTidy #GBSpringclean in #Barnet üå≥üåç with @Thames21üíßüåä along the #BurntOakBrook We filled 65+bags with all kinds of litter + removed a glass plate, scooters, a bin, wood, poles, plastic, metal..#WatlingPark #BurntOak #PickItBagItBinItBarnet https://t.co/9KcudaWUxe

@davemh72 @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe No willingness from EA and @PHE_uk to record data inside properties - think it would exceed exposure limits to H2S. Need a health legal expert imho. #stopthestink

Thank you @DJAndyMoor & @djlange for listening to us you don't know how much that means ‚ù§Ô∏è You both have very kind hearts. On the back of talking to admin of @StinkStopthe & @Cap_it_off any raising of awareness that this isn't just a smell but poisonous gases would be amazing üòä https://t.co/FJUqLaDLMv
